Military Unit Setup Menu The current Guards' defense level is %guard_buff_level%. If you raise their defense level when the enemy attacks, your P. Atk./P. Def. will be increased, giving you an advantage in battle. At each level, you may also provide the Guards with weapons and armor. Extension is possible up to 2 levels. Providing high-level weapons/armor requires 100,000 Adena, and providing top-level weapons/armor requires 150,000 Adena.
[npc_%objectId%_toLevel1 @2221;|Provide high-level weapons/armor (Lv0 -> Lv1).] [npc_%objectId%_toLevel2 @2221;|Provide top-level weapons/armor (Lv1 -> Lv2).]
